response.original_title: The Search for the Ultimate Survivor: The Mystery of Us
response.overview: Through reenactments, computer animation and expert analysis, this two-hour National Geographic documentary charts the origins of humanity, chronicling the evolutionary development that left Homo sapiens as the lone remaining human species. The video presents intriguing new discoveries -- from hobbit-sized people to giant hominids -- that not only shed light on our past but challenge many long-held scientific beliefs.
response.title: The Search for the Ultimate Survivor: The Mystery of Us
